policy: UNESCO-only Italian cultural heritage sites. One item returned per request.

items.name: Colosseum
items.one_liner: An ancient Roman amphitheatre used for public spectacles during the Roman Empire.

items.name: Historic Centre of Florence
items.one_liner: A Renaissance urban ensemble that played a central role in European art and architecture.

items.name: Venice and its Lagoon
items.one_liner: A unique maritime city built on a lagoon, reflecting centuries of cultural exchange.
